text: Tiberias (; , Tverya, Tiveria ; , ) is a city in northern Israel. It is located along the Sea of Galilee, in the Lower Galilee at the Jordan Valley. Tiberias has been considered one of Judaism's four holiest cities, along with Jerusalem, Hebron and Safed. == Other websites == * City council website Municipality Site in Hebrew * Place To Visit in Tiberias (English) * Tiberias - City of Treasures: The official website of the Tiberias Excavation Project * Hamat Tiberias National Park : description, photo gallery * Nefesh B'Nefesh Community Guide for Tiveria-Tiberias, Israel
title: Tiberias
